full_description:
Smart SEL-24L22KS 24" HD Basic LED Television

The Smart SEL-24L22KS Television comes with a 32" HD (1366 x 768), LED display. It is a slim and attractive television. Its design blends into any current decor and enriches the style without overpowering it. The High-Dynamic Range feature boosts your TV's brightness, allowing you to enjoy a wide range of colors and visual details even in low-light situations. It brings flat images to life by adjusting the contrast, resulting in better image quality and depth. The smart TV has a different sound mode like Movie, User, Standard, Music, and Sports. The new Smart Television includes 2x HDMI, 1x USB Ports, 1x VGA port, and 1x Audio Line Out port. It has a 5-year warranty (Parts warranty 02 Years, Panel warranty 05 Years & Service warranty 05 Years).

Smart Warranty Cards must be kept for warranty claims. (To claim the warranty, please call Sony smart Customer Care on 09610977977. and they will provide free home service anywhere in Bangladesh.)

The Smart SEL-24LU22KS is a 24-inch HD Basic Ultra Protective LED Television with a 1360x768 resolution that provides a clear and bright viewing experience. The Smart SEL-24LU22KS Television's front panel and rear cover are made of sturdy plastic fiber material. The TV is supported by a strong fiber/plastic stand and has a stylish, compact appearance. With its flexible picture modes Bright, Standard, and Soft, and User may tailor the display to suit their tastes. A dynamic sound experience is offered by the internally powered audio output, which has modes for music, sports, movies, users, and standard settings. With two HDMI ports and one USB connector, the Smart SEL-24LU22KS 24-inch HD LED Television also provides connectivity choices to meet a range of multimedia needs. Clear and strong sound reproduction is ensured by the 4W+4W audio power output. This television, which measures 549 x 327 x 67 mm without the base, is a great option for individuals looking for a dependable and space-saving entertainment option because it is not only visually appealing but also compact.
